Attention!

This event is not yet released on the Global server; the following information is based on translations which may not match the official English localization and will be updated when the Global release is announced.

Gyoko Kichion
Type
Crossover special event
Crossovers with
Taiko no Tatsujin
Etymology
Japanese for "blessed songs of (the) drums"
In Other Languages
Chinese
御鼓吉音
Release
CN date
2025/07/22–2025/08/05

Gyoko Kichion is a special collaboration event between Arknights and Taiko no Tatsujin.

Contents

  • 1 Operations
    • 1.1 Annihilation
  • 2 Event missions
  • 3 Outfits
    • 3.1 Fashion Review
  • 4 Navigation

Operations[edit]

Annihilation[edit]

[CN] Saltfin Skeleton Salt Flat is introduced as the Rotating Mission from July 28 to October 27, 2025.

Event missions[edit]

During the event, players can obtain event points from completing certain tasks and can receive milestone rewards from reaching certain amount of points.

Outfits[edit]

The following outfits are available in the Outfit Store until August 23, 2025:

New
Re-edition
Additional information: Bustling Festival cannot be redeemed by using an Outfit Voucher.

Fashion Review[edit]

[CN] The Fashion Review is updated with the following outfits:
